quest.name: All Good Things
journal: Y'shtola is keen to discuss your next task.

Though news of your victory over the Lord of Crags has almost certainly reached Limsa Lominsa already, Y'shtola would like you to return to Maelstrom Command and formally report to High Commander Rhiki that Titan is no longer a threat.

High Commander Rhiki thanks you for your efforts on behalf of Limsa Lominsa, and bids you send her regards to your fellow Scions. Shortly afterwards, Minfilia contacts you via linkpearl to offer her congratulations on your victory and request your presence at the Waking Sands.

Upon your return to the Waking Sands, you are greeted by a sight to make your blood run cold. The bodies of your allies lie strewn about─victims of what must have been a desperate struggle. Would that you had been there to protect them. Search for survivors and offer them what succor you can.

While searching for signs of life, you come upon Noraxia. To your dismay, the sylph is mortally wounded. Using the power of the Echo, you learn from her that the Waking Sands was raided by imperial forces, who slaughtered countless Scions before departing─with prisoners. Minfilia is among them. With her dying breath, Noraxia implores you to seek shelter at the Church of Saint Adama Landama in eastern Thanalan. The thought of leaving her and the others fills you with anguish...but if you are to rescue the prisoners and avenge the dead, you must first survive.

Suspecting that Father Iliud is a friend, you weave the Scions' password into a humble request, much as you did on the day you joined the order. Recognizing you as an associate of Minfilia, the priest offers you sanctuary while you consider how to proceed in the wake of this terrible tragedy.
objectives: Seek shelter at the Church of Saint Adama Landama.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Though word will already have reached Maelstrom Command, protocol requires that a representative of our order inform the high commander of the mission's success. The honor is rightfully yours, Forename.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Once again, I must commend you on a job well done. We shall speak again soon.

dialogue.name: RASHAHT
dialogue.text: [GC Rank]It is good to see you, SurnameThank you for coming, Forename. Word of your triumph reached me some while ago, but I am pleased to have it personally confirmed.

dialogue.name: RASHAHT
dialogue.text: First Ifrit and now Titan... Truly, when I think of your achievements, I feel the loss of the Warriors of Light less keenly─and there can be no greater compliment than that. You and your order are heroes. Suffice it to say, we are glad to have a Scion in our ranksThe people of Limsa Lominsa are forever in your debt.

dialogue.name: RASHAHT
dialogue.text: I shall relay the details of your report to the Admiral forthwith. Please send my regards to the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. [GC Rank] Until next time, .

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Forename, this is Minfilia. Y'shtola has informed me of your success.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: You have won a great victory for the people of Eorzea, one that shall not be forgotten.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: And what is more, both you and Y'shtola emerged from O'Ghomoro unscathed. Why, Tataru and the others seemed as glad of that as they did of Titan's fall!

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text:
You can look forward to a hero's welcome!
We'll be awaiting your return at the Waking Sands. There is much to discuss. Godsspeed.

dialogue.name: NPCA
dialogue.text: You hear that commotion just now? What in the seven hells were they doin' in there? Wrestlin' a peiste!? You look like the adventurous type. Mind takin' a quick look?

dialogue.name: NPCB
dialogue.text: ...Was that screaming I heard? I'm not sure I want to know...

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: //? use your contrived psychic powers on the dying sylph to figure out what the hell happened

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: This one is glad...walking one is safe...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: We'll be awaiting your return at the Waking Sands. There is much to discuss. Godsspeed.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Thank heavens shehe is safe.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Louisoix, do you see? Your light shines brightly in this one. And in time, it will illuminate the realm once more.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: <gasp>

dialogue.name: FLAMESENTRY
dialogue.text: うわぁぁぁっ！！

dialogue.name: FLAMESENTRY
dialogue.text: ぎゃああ！

dialogue.name: FLAMESENTRY
dialogue.text: 敵しゅ……ぐはッ！！

dialogue.name: DAWNMEMBER
dialogue.text: (-Scion of the Seventh Dawn-)Advance no further!

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: We have come for the one who slayed Ifrit and Titan!

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Bring her forth! And you may yet know mercy!Bring him forth! Or you shall know no mercy!

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: <whimper>

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Confound it.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Stay out of sight. I would leave a message with you.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I surrender myself, on the condition you spare the innocents.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Conditions? There speaks the supreme Scion.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: I'll grant you have courage, but you would be better served by armor.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Search all you will, the one you seek is not here.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: So it would seem.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: And yet you knew to look here...but how? <gasp>

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Hold that thought.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: No!

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Conditions of surrender...denied.

dialogue.name: DAWNMEMBER
dialogue.text: Cease at once!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: くそ……ッ。

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: キャッ！

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Have you not done enough!

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Perhaps. Enough! We must away.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: Though we have not found our quarry, the “High Priestess of the Scions” should suffice for now.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: They say she also possesses the Echo. I cannot wait to hear her scream.

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: I said “enough!”

dialogue.name: LIVIA
dialogue.text: We leave! Bring the prisoners.

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: Walking...walking one Minfilia...asked this one to... <groan>

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: In case walking one r-returned...this one was to say...to say...

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: At church in eastern Thanalan...walking one must claim sanctuary...

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: This one tried...tried to protect walking one Minfilia f-from imperial ones...

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: For...give...this...one.

dialogue.name: NORAXIA
dialogue.text: Save...

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: Is something troubling you, my childson? You have the look of one who has endured great suffering. If there is anything I can do to help─anything at all─you need only ask.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Forgive me, Father, for I have sinned.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Curse my enemies, Father! Call down divine vengeance upon those who butchered my friends!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: The wild roses are dead, Father, and I know not what to do.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: Close your eyes and look within. Acknowledge your misdeeds and your regrets. Pray endeavor to atone with an earnest heart, and you shall surely find salvation, my childson.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: The crimes of which you speak are grave...yet I cannot do that which you ask of me. Be assured, however, that the gods see all. If you would ask them for anything, let it be justice and not vengeance.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: ...The wild roses? I see. You may speak freely here. We are all friends of the Scions.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: How...how could this have happened...?

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: And you are certain that Minfilia was among those taken by the Garleans?

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: Let us pray no further harm comes to them...

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: You may stay here for as long as you wish. It is the least I can do for a friend of Minfilia's.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: I have known her since she was but a child... Well do I recall the day of our first meeting.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: I swore then to do everything in my power to support her, and I will gladly offer the selfsame service to her brother and sister Scions.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: So please─no matter what you require, you need not hesitate to ask.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: Marques, would you come here for a moment?

dialogue.name: MARQUEZ
dialogue.text: Yes, Father?

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: If you require assistance, pray speak with Marques. He is a trifle shy, but I assure you he means well.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: I should explain─Marques is a survivor of the battle of Carteneau. Alas, his experiences took a terrible toll upon his mind... Had we not taken him into our care, he would surely have perished in the desert.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: Marques, I want you to look after Forename. Do you understand?

dialogue.name: MARQUEZ
dialogue.text: Yes, Father...

obj.n: You Can't Take It with You
You Can't Take It with You
